WorkItem.Description:
2 things I have found.  When setting up the ISB uptime for raid shadow users, the shadow priest section is actually labelled "Warlocks".  Nothing major, but thought it was worth pointing out.
Â 
More importantly, when I ran the optimizer it apparently doesnt consider any enchants when choosing gear.  If I did not select any enchants (by putting a diamond aside of them) will the optimizer simply not choose any?  If thats the case, then its my error, otherwise when I ran the optimizer, it selected gear appropriately and it got me to 16% hit, but none of my gear was enchanted, once I added the head enchant, I could upgrade some items to get a higher DPS and still remain hit capped.  Im thinking I just screwed up the enchant set up though.

Comments.Message: You have to select enchants as available. Unless you have the option disabled it should warn you if you don't have any selected as available.
The think I have noticed is it doenst count for haste gear as much as it does for crit and everythign I read is Haste> Crit
Can you attach the character XML file for which it said crit was > haste? Also, thanks about the group box label, I'll deal with that.
